extension.name: OPC Theme - Clean Simple 2
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description: Clean simple theme is based on pbv multi's tabs, uses two columns and can use login tab as default action. This theme is popular in Sweden especially when used with Klarna and without additional shipping address.

param.name: login_is_default
param.label: Show Login section by default
param.description: Will display login section by default for unlogged customers

param.name: use_delimiters
param.label: Use VM delimiters
param.description: Will display delimiters in checkout areas of bill to, shipping or cart fields. They are not enabled by default, so they don't break your design by default. You may need to create new delimiters, as the core delimiters may get reordered by OPC logic.
